Uses of Interface
net.sf.javaml.filter.InstanceFilter

  • Packages that use InstanceFilter 
    Package Description
    net.sf.javaml.filter
    Provides filters for instances and data sets.
    net.sf.javaml.filter.discretize
    Provides filters that can discretize continuous values
    net.sf.javaml.filter.instance
    Filters that can be run on a single instance at once.
    net.sf.javaml.filter.missingvalue
    Contains filters that can be used to replace missing values with more sensible information.
    net.sf.javaml.filter.normalize
    Provides filters to normalize values.

    • Uses of InstanceFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter

      Classes in net.sf.javaml.filter that implement InstanceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFilter
      Umbrella class for filters that implements both the InstanceFilter and DatasetFilter interfaces.
      class  ClassReplaceFilter
      Replaces a certain class value with another one.
      class  RemoveAttributes 
      class  RetainAttributes
      Filter to retain a set of wanted attributes and remove all others
      class  UnsetClassFilter
      Filter to remove class information from a data set or instance.

    • Uses of InstanceFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.discretize

      Classes in net.sf.javaml.filter.discretize that implement InstanceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EqualWidthBinning
      A filter that discretizes a range of numeric attributes in the data set into nominal attributes.
      class  FourBinMinimalEntropyPartitioning
      A filter that discretizes a range of numeric attributes in the data set into 4 nominal attributes.
      class  RecursiveMinimalEntropyPartitioning
      A filter that discretizes a range of numeric attributes in the data set into nominal attributes.
      class  ThreeBinMinimalEntropyPartitioning
      A filter that discretizes a range of numeric attributes in the data set into 3 nominal attributes.
      class  TwoBinMinimalEntropyPartitioning
      A filter that discretizes a range of numeric attributes in the data set into 2 nominal attributes.

    • Uses of InstanceFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.instance

      Classes in net.sf.javaml.filter.instance that implement InstanceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CeilValueFilter
      Filter to replace all values with their ceiled equivalent.
      class  FloorValueFilter
      Filter to replace all values with their rounded equivalent
      class  ReplaceValueFilter 
      class  RoundValueFilter
      Filter to replace all values with their rounded equivalent

    • Uses of InstanceFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.missingvalue

      Classes in net.sf.javaml.filter.missingvalue that implement InstanceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReplaceWithValue
      Replaces all Double.NaN and Double.Infinity values with a fixed value.

    • Uses of InstanceFilter in net.sf.javaml.filter.normalize

      Classes in net.sf.javaml.filter.normalize that implement InstanceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InstanceNormalizeMidrange
      This filter will normalize all the attributes in an instance to a certain interval determined by a mid-range and a range.
      class  NormalizeMean
      This filter will normalize the data set with mean 0 and standard deviation 1 The normalization will be done on the attributes, so each attribute will have mean 0 and std 1.
      class  NormalizeMeanIQR135
      This filter will normalize the data set with mean 0 and standard deviation 1 The normalization will be done on the attributes, so each attribute will have mean 0 and std 1.
      class  NormalizeMidrange
      This filter will normalize the data set with a certain mid-range and a certain range for each attribute.
